NotificationTemplate.subject: Welcome to OpenIZ!
NotificationTemplate.body:
Hello {{ $UserName }}

Welcome to the OpenIZ solution. Your account has been created by {{ $authenticatedUser }}. You'll have to Activate Your Account and set a new password.

User Name: {{ $UserName }}

Temporary Password: {{ $password }}

After you have activated your account you will be able to log in with your new credentials. The link above will expire {{ $expiry }}
